messages.subject: Unschooling.com
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 2/26/03 2:21:08 AM Central Standard Time, AlwaysLearning@yahoogroups.com writes:
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 2/26/03 2:21:08 AM Central Standard Time,
AlwaysLearning@yahoogroups.com writes:

<< I like this list, but I'd have to say that I like the WAY
unschooling.com is set up. >>

I think there is some confusion about unschooling.com......we're talking
about the email list which is connected to the message board but operates
just like this list. :)
It has some die hard unschoolers also on this list and nothing that is
anti-unschooling would get ignored, believe me!!
That's where some of the difficulties lie, many people don't want to hear
that they are not unschooling.

Ren
"The sun is shining--the sun is shining. That is the magic. The flowers are
growing--the roots are stirring. That is the magic. Being alive is the
magic--being strong is the magic The magic is in me--the magic is in
me....It's in every one of us."

----Frances Hodgson Burnett
